name: Drinking in Season: Concord Martini
description: Since the grapes have such a strong flavor and color, I created a simple martini that really allowed it to shine. Fresh concord grape juice is paired with a hefty serving of vodka and a splash of white vermouth to make a cocktail that is 100% adult. Each sip starts with the vivid, sweet flavor of the grapes and ends with the warm, sharp taste of vodka—a perfect balance.
recipeIngredient: 20 Concord grapes (or 1 ounce fresh, high-quality concord grape juice)
1/2 ounce dry vermouth, such as Dolin
Garnish: 2 concord grapes on a skewer

recipeInstructions.text: Muddle the concord grapes in a jar or glass until completely smashed and liquid is released. If you're using already-pressed juice, proceed to step 2.
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and strain the juice into the cocktail shaker. Add vodka and vermouth.
Shake for 10 seconds and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with two concord grapes on a skewer.
